summary: This module defines a ScaleBiasLayer class that applies an element-wise affine transformation (scale and bias) to its input, optionally learning the scale and bias parameters. It can be disabled to act as a pass-through, serving as a lightweight alternative to full layer normalization.
business_intent: The purpose of this module is to provide a flexible and efficient layer for neural networks that can either perform scaling and biasing or act as a no-op, depending on configuration. This can be useful in various deep learning models where layer normalization might be too costly or unnecessary.
